Text: Re Energy Farm Project Bloomfield New Mexico Cc Kevin Please accept my apology for not meeting with you while you were in Bloomfield Jeff Fawcett explained that he wasnt coming and that you were coming instead Michael Mack the president of Ameramex and I were both eager to meet with you We were there for the entire meeting but we did not realize that you were there The first that I learned that you were at the meeting was when I received a copy of the email to you from Brian OHare our consultant I had explained that you might be attending and that you and I had never met Needless to say I am embarrassed and utterly astonished that Brian did not point you out to me or point me out to you Once again I apologize for us being so disjointed and for missing the opportunity to meet you personally and discuss some of the issues that Jeff and I have been discussing I appreciate you taking the time to come to Bloomfield and look forward to meeting you some time in the near future Thank You Richard L Moore Original Message From cashel To Hyatt J Kevin Cc Moore Richard L Mack Michael A Sent Monday February PM Subject Energy Farm Project Bloomfield New Mexico Kevin I want to take a few minutes to say that it was a pleasure to meet you last week in Bloomfield and to thank you for taking the time from your busy schedule to attend the meeting I sincerely appreciate your support at the meeting and your comments helped a great deal in clarifying some of the concerns I know you and Rick Moore are working together and trust that you can finalize issues as soon as possible Thank you again for your time and support and I look forward to seeing you again in a better atmosphere Brian OHare Consultant to Ameramex Energy Group Inc
